subject: Barbaro (Race Horse)
Preakness Stakes
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: A colt named Chelokee captured the first running of the Barbaro Stakes, named for last year’s Kentucky Derby winner who was euthanized in January after an injury.
snippet: A colt named Chelokee captured the first running of the Barbaro Stakes, named for last year’s Kentucky Derby winner who was euthanized in January after an injury.
